description:
A1 fit - Interval Trainer

You want to get fit or even more fit?
With Interval Training you will archive this goal in less time
with better results compared to classic endurance training.
Google "Interval training" yourself to get all the interesting details about interval training.

A1 fit - Interval Trainer is designed to help you with your training.
I wrote this program because i needed a good app for myself that i now use on a nearly daylie basis.

Features:
- Easy to use
- Individual Warm Up and Cool Down timers
- High and Low Intensity timers with Intervals
- Timer Display for each Phase
- Tmer Display for Total Time
- Progress Bar for each Phase
- Progress Bar for Total Time 
- Phase indicator
- Different Background Colors for each Phase
- Different loud Audio Signals for Phase change
- Display stays on during training
- App continues to work when you turn of the screen
- Sound works simultanious to other music apps
- Timer settings are stored on exit
- Preferences to disable sound or background color

The next updates are already planned. 
You miss a function? For Ideas & Support please write me a email and i am happy to take a look at this.
versionNote: Bug fixed that caused audio playback problems in certain situations.
